post.body: Hi everyone. How are you doing? Just joined. :D so sick of the main internet with all of its paywalls. Thinking of making a ios python script but don't know how for zeronet any thoughts on that? Been coding in python for a while now. tbh. Hope to here from you soon!

Thoughts on solar? Is it the future? Do you think it can replace oil? I just got a powerbank but its really flimsy. Do you think it is possible in the future we quit oil or maybe we could just get the computer to generate the power with a neural chip that grabs solar energy from the sun with optimized light using some sort of machine learning dataset on the suns point in time then transfers that data and tells the user when the right point of the day it is to charge their laptops?
